caption.p: Sectioned Kidney of control Wistar rat shows normal tubules and normal glomerulus (A). Fig. 15 Indicates that sectioned kidney of test rats administered AESG 500 mg/kg with mildly atrophied glomerulus and tubules that appear normal (A). Fig. 16 Indicates sectioned kidney of rat administered AESG 1000 mg/kg shows normal tubules and glomerulus (A). Fig. 17 Shows sectioned kidney of rat administered AESG 2000 mg/kg with normal tubules and glomerulus (A).
